ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(RW_Unregistered_Broker_Name__c!=null,RW_Unregistered_Broker_Mobile__c!=null),RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c!=true, $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Apply Unregistered Broker should be checked.
